data.title: Tunings
data.text:
A note about the tunings:

Tunings listed here are accurate, but remember that they are relative and may not be at concert pitch. For example, I usually tune my six string guitar down one half step (E=E flat, etc.) but still refer to the tunings as if they were at concert pitch. Capo positions vary, so use your ears.

THERE AND GONE

1. There and Gone DADGBE

2. There It Goes DADF#AD

3. I’m So Lonesome I Could Cry DGDGBD

4. On a Pennsylvania Hill DADF#AD (tuned down one half step)

5. Last To Know DGDGBD

6. Rye Whiskey Mash CGCEGC (actual pitch)

7. Heart Like a Wheel DGDGBD

8. Brothers DADGBE

9. Kept Walking DADF#AD (tuned down one half step)

10. Killing the Blues DADF#AD

11. Three Quarter North DADF#AD

12. A Little Further DADGBE

13. Imagine/Across the Universe DADGBE

14. First To Know DGDGBD

HOUSE OF GUITARS

1. Promised Land: DADGBE

2: Poor Wayfaring Stranger: DADF#AD

3. Try to Stay: DADF#AD

4. Because of you, This: EADGBE

5. I Will: DADGBE

6. Shallow Brown: DADF#AD

7. Farther Along: DADGBE

8. I Just Can’t Keep From Crying Sometimes: DADF#AD

9: Let It Be Me: EADGBE

10: Junk: EADGBE

11: Promised Land (reprise): DADGBE

SUNNYLAND

1. Avalon Train: DADGBE

2. 5 to 99: DGDGBD

3. Either Way She Walks: DADF#AD (six string and Weissenborn)

4. Sunnyland: DADF#AD

5. Just a Closer Walk With Thee: DADF#AD

6. Sunday Blues: DGDGBD

7: I Just Can’t Keep From Crying Sometimes: DADF#AD

8. Amazing Grace: DADF#AD (lap steel), DADGBE (six string)

9. Night Owl Blues: DGDGBD

10. Still Not Sorry You’re Gone: EADGBE

11. Sunnyland (reprise): DADF#AD

12. Little Road: DGDGBD

13. Sunday Street Stroll: DADGBE

14. Not Blind In Heaven: DADF#AD

ON A COLD WINTER’S NIGHT

1. Joy To the World: DADGBE

2. Away in a Manger: DADF#AD

3. The First Noel: DADGBE

4. In the Bleak Midwinter: DADGBE

5. I Saw Three Ships: DADF#AD

6. Angels We Have Heard on High: EADGBE

7. The Holly and the Ivy: DADF#AD

8. O, Holy Night: DADGBE

9. Little Drummer Boy: EADGBE

10. Christmas Medley: EADGBE

11. All Through the Night: DADGBE

12. White Christmas: EADGBE (six string), EBEG#BE (Weissenborn)

Henry Mancini; PINK GUITAR

Moon River: CADGBE

THE LIVE ALBUM

Onstage I’m not always relying on my electronic tuner- sometimes they slow me down, other times I just don’t care. These should get you pretty close. Please note that on the 12 string pieces “Malaika” and “Isa Lei” the guitar is in drop D but pitched at B or thereabout. On “Shallow Brown” and “Homage” I’m using a Weissenborn style guitar which is played lap style. You can get most of the stuff if you play slide in a conventional manner with a little practice. Thanks for your interest and good luck!

1. Tennessee: DADGAD (Down 1/2 step, capo 2)

2. Malaika: DADGBE (D=B)

3. Great Dream From Heaven: DADGBE (Down 1/2 step, capo 2)

4. Shallow Brown: DADF#AD ( D=B)

5. Duet: DGDGBD (down 1/2 step)

6. Isa Lei: DADGBE (D=B)

7. Homage: DADF# AD (D=B)

8. Si Bhig, Si Mhor: DADGBD (down 1/2 step, capo 5)

9. Slide Improv: DADF# AD

10. The Handing Down: EADEAE

11. Malaika: DADGBE

12. The Water Is Wide: DADGBE capo 3

COUNTING THE WAYS

1. Willy O’Winsbury:

FIRST GUITAR: DADF#AD, Capo 5 SECOND GUITAR: CGDGBD

HIGH STRING GUITAR: DADGBE, Capo 5

2. If I Fell/In My Life: BOTH GUITARS: DADGBE, Capo?

3. Malaika: STANDARD TUNING, Capo 4

4.Isa Lei

FIRST GUITAR: DADF#AD

HIGH STRUNG GUITAR: STANDARD TUNING, Capo 5

BROZMAN’S WEISSENBORN HAWAIIAN GUITAR:

CGCGCE (actually up a half step to C#)

ED’S HAWAIIAN GUITAR: DADF#AD

5. Maria Elena:

ALL GUITARS: DADGBE (down a whole step- D=C)

6. Wild Mountain Thyme:

DGDGBD (down a whole step to F)

7. Spanish Harlem:

FIRST AND SECOND GUITARS: DGDGBD (down a whole step to F)

8. My Creole Belle:

BOTH GUITARS: STANDARD TUNING, CONCERT PITCH, Capo 2

9. Can’t Help Falling in Love:

MAIN GUITARS STANDARD TUNING, Capo 4

HAWAIIAN GUITAR: DADF#AD (up a half step to E flat)

10. The Water is Wide: DADGBE, Capo 3

NIGHT BIRDS

1. DUET — D G D G B D

2. CROW — E A D G A E

3. NO.11 — F A C G C E

4. SPIKE #2 — D G D G B D

5. LOST HIGHWAY — E A C# E A E

6. SI BHIG, SI MHOR — D A D G B D

7. NO.7. — E A E E B E

8. THE FRENCH LADY — E G D G C D

9. SUITE (I-IV) — E A D E A E

10. NIGHT BIRDS — D G D G B D

CHRISTMAS

* Denotes standard tuning. Most pieces on CHRISTMAS have multiple guitars, so the tuning given is for the primary guitars. Capo positions vary- experiment !

1. IT CAME UPON A MIDNIGHT CLEAR *

2. GOOD KING WENCESLAS — D G D G B D

3. O COME, ALL YE FAITHFUL *

4. COVENTRY CAROL *

5. O TANNENBAUM — D A D G B E

6. WHAT CHILD IS THIS? *

7. SILVER BELLS *

8. AWAY IN A MANGER — D G D G B D

9. WE THREE KINGS *

10. CAROL OF THE BELLS *

11. O HOLY NIGHT– D A D G B E

12. A MIGHTY FORTRESS IS OUR GOD — D A D G B E

13.VARIATIONS ON PACHELBELS’ CANON

14. SILENT NIGHT — D A D G B E

LUNA

1. TENNESSEE — D A D G A D

2. RED MOUNTAIN SERENADE — D A D G B E

3. POSTCARD FROM LIMBO — D A D G B E

4. FOG TRILOGY — C G D G A D

5. BLUE HIGHWAY — B A D E A D

6. LUNA — C G C Eb B C

7. HORSES IN THE RAIN — B G C F G C

8. GEARHAT — C G D G A D

9. THE HANDING DOWN — E A D E A E

10. HOWL — D A D F# A D

Reader Interactions
